Kirdy Stevens films always have attractive and talented people and most can also act. Incest is not an attractive subject but Stevens is easily forgiven as he pads the film with humor and suddenly you don't feel like its a porno anymore. At the same time Jimmy and his best friend Bryan are trying to promote a band at a club (a great scene capturing hot sexy babes dancing to the band's super catchy song all filmed MTV style) by inviting as many willing hotties as they can to lure a record producer (Ron Jeremy) and partners to an after party orgy. No silicone, back door lovin', tattoos, body piercings, viagara or anything degrading towards women that is standard fare today. Shot on glorious film the dvd and audio quality towers over most retro adult titles with a very clear presentation of this 1980s classic.
